title: Operation Charisma: How to Get Charisma and Wind Up at the Top
features: is a user-friendly, no nonsense self-help book which teaches readers how to get charisma and wind up at the top. It's a highly practical self-help book which provides the tools to succeed in business and social life.

is all readers need to know, to jumstart their careers and social life. The book is replete with real-life examples illustrating important concepts to acquire charisma. Readers are assured to add charisma to their personalities making them more persuasive, likeable and popular.
description: "Fully 85% of your success in life will be determined by your ability to influence and persuade other people. This book shows you how to be a more powerful and effective person in every human interaction." --

"Stimulating, provocative and entertaining, Operation Charisma identifies the esential building blocks for reaching the pinnacles of success. This book packs a wallop of insight, making true believers of even the most skeptical readers." --

John M. Curtis, Ph.D. is director of a West Los Angeles think tank specializing in human behavior, health care and political research and media consultation. He's a seminar trainer, columnist and author of numerous professional publications and

. He's been preparing people to face the media, teaching high-end sales skills, and giving human behavior consultation for more than 20 years. Dr. Curtis is frequently heard on KNX News Radio (CBS-Los Angeles) and other radio and TV stations commenting on public relations/human behavior issues.
